title: Faced With a Vaccine Emergency, the EU Made an Enemy of Everyone
content:
1. Faced With a Vaccine Emergency, the EU Made an Enemy of Everyone  Bloomberg
  2. EU vaccine export row: Bloc backtracks on controls for NI  BBC News
  3. Arlene Foster: EU limit on vaccines into Northern Ireland is 'hostile and aggressive'  Guardian News
  4. UK says it expects no vaccine interruption from EU; Brussels admits Irish 'blunder'  Yahoo News
  5. EU 'fiasco' on N Ireland heaps pressure on Commission  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
